![](../images/tidyverse2.png)

## Tutorials

In RStudio there is the tutorial pane in the upper right.

![](../images/tutorial-pane.png)

Within that there are three tutorial videos.

1.  The first is called "Filter observations"

2.  The second is called "Create new variables"

3.  The third is called "Summarise Tables"

These three tutorials will get you started with the basic verbs for manipulating data.

-   filter()

-   select()

-   group_by()

-   mutate()

-   summarize()

## There are so many websites teaching the tidyverse.

Lots tutorials exist online.
